```{r}
set.seed(0)
x <- 1:100
y1 <- rnorm(100)
y2 <- rnorm(100)
data <- data.frame(x=x, y1=y1, y2=y2)
p <- gvisLineChart(data, xvar='x', yvar=c('y1', 'y2'))
plot(p)
```

```{r}
map <- gvisGeoChart(Exports, locationvar = 'Country', colorvar = 'Profit', options=list(width=600, height=400))
tab <- gvisTable(Exports)
motion <- gvisMotionChart(Fruits, 'Fruit', 'Year', xvar='Expenses', yvar='Sales', options=list(width=600, height=400))
map_tab <- gvisMerge(map, tab, horizontal = F)
map_tab_motion <- gvisMerge(map_tab, motion, horizontal = T)
plot(map_tab_motion)
```
